content:
John's pain points may include:

* Difficulty finding the best deals and discounts available
* Limited understanding of blockchain and web3 technologies, which may make it difficult to fully utilize the savings platform
* Difficulty keeping track of savings and rewards earned through the platform
* Difficulty redeeming rewards and discounts in a seamless and user-friendly way
* Difficulty finding other like-minded individuals or resources that can provide support and guidance in using the savings platform
* Difficulty in finding platforms that offer web3-based savings opportunities.

In summary, John's pain points are related to the difficulty in finding the best deals and discounts, the lack of understanding of the technology, difficulty in keeping track of rewards, difficulty in redeeming rewards, difficulty in finding support and guidance, and difficulty in finding web3-based savings opportunities.
